full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 69 of 247 197 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross the cockpit to use the restroom? A. Correct. Q. And you did that both on the Gulf Stream and on the Boeing; is that correct? A. Yes. Q. The Gulf Stream bathroom, you said, was in the back of the plane; right? A. Yes. Q. And the Boeing bathroom was near the cockpit but outside the cockpit; is that right? A. Exactly, yes. Q. So if you went to the bathroom in the Boeing, you could still see the cabin where the passengers were, at least the first cabin? A. If the door was open. Each section of the aircraft had a door and typically the doors were open. Q. Well, in any of those trips to the restroom, you never saw any sexual activity on the plane? A. No, I never did. Q. And you had also, I think, occasion go to get coffee in the galley kitchen; is that right? A. In the Boeing, yes. I would go to the middle of the aircraft to get a cup of coffee on occasion, sure. Q. And as you said in the Boeing, the galley kitchens is in the middle of the aircraft; is that right? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017431
